original_title: Asiri Hospital in Sri Lanka’s Port City named strategic investment
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Asiri Port City (Pvt) Ltd was listed by the cabinet as a project that can receive strategic investment benefits, Minister Bandula Gunawardana said.
The 100 million US dollar project will get benefits under guidelines issued to for enterprise in Colombo Port City.
The Colombo Port City is a multiple currency special economic zone. (Colombo/Jan04/2023)
